Summary UX Leader and Product Designer with experience in Lean Start Up and Agile Product development. I bring strategic thinking, creative problem solving and natural leadership to the table. I have a deep understanding of how products are built and released. I thrive on motivating global cross functional teams to embrace a user centered approach to delivering incremental value to people via products and experiences they love.  
 
I am a frequent speaker in the community, and have given workshops in Lean UX methods that allow the business and development team to quickly form solutions hypothesis, test the usefulness and usability with end-users, and respond to data through incremental improvement.
